description: Configuration for LegiScan State Bill Analysis Pipeline
notes: This is a basic configuration for the AI analysis passes
API keys should be set as environment variables (PORTKEY_API_KEY, LEGISCAN_API_KEY)
See config_examples/ directory for more advanced configuration options

filter_pass.description: First pass: quick filter on bill metadata

analysis_pass.description: Second pass: deep analysis with full bill text from LegiScan API

legiscan.description: LegiScan API configuration and caching settings

hooks.description: Data enrichment hooks for flexible data processing
notes: Hooks execute at configurable timing points (pre_analysis, post_analysis, etc.)
LegiScan hook fetches full bill text from LegiScan API before analysis
Hook system is optional - disable by setting enabled to false

pre_analysis.description: Fetch full bill text from LegiScan API before AI analysis
